title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 139.6 - Computation of future increments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 139.6 - Computation of future increments

State Regulations

For the purpose of computing future increments, those
incumbent State employees qualifying for increased compensation under section
139.5
of this Part and those new
employees appointed at a salary above the minimum under this Part shall be
credited with the number of years of service in their respective positions
which correspond with such rate of compensation or salary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
139.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
